 1	import type { AppConfig } from '@/shared/types/app'
 2	
 3	// 应用组件接口
 4	export interface AppModule {
 5	 default: React.ComponentType
 6	 config: AppConfig
 7	}
 8	
 9	// 应用注册表 - 延迟加载所有应用
 10	const APP_REGISTRY = {
 11	 calculator: () => import('@/apps/calculator/app'),
 12	 'code-converter': () => import('@/apps/code-converter/app'),
 13	 'markdown-editor': () => import('@/apps/markdown-editor/index'),
 14	 'qr-generator': () => import('@/apps/qr-generator/index'),
 15	 'rootcause-analyzer': () => import('@/apps/rootcause-analyzer/index'),
 16	 // 更多应用将在这里注册...
 17	} as const
 18	
 19	export type AppId = keyof typeof APP_REGISTRY
 20	
 21	// 获取所有注册的应用ID
 22	export function getRegisteredApps(): AppId[] {
 23	 return Object.keys(APP_REGISTRY) as AppId[]
 24	}
 25	
 26	// 动态加载应用
 27	export async function loadApp(appId: AppId): Promise<AppModule | null> {
 28	 try {
 29	 const loader = APP_REGISTRY[appId]
 30	 if (!loader) {
 31	 console.error(`应用 "${appId}" 未注册`)
 32	 return null
 33	 }
 34	 
 35	 const module = await loader()
 36	 return module
 37	 } catch (error) {
 38	 console.error(`加载应用 "${appId}" 失败:`, error)
 39	 return null
 40	 }
 41	}
 42	
 43	// 通过路径查找应用ID
 44	export function findAppByPath(path: string): AppId | null {
 45	 // 移除前导斜杠
 46	 const cleanPath = path.replace(/^\/+/, '')
 47	 
 48	 // 匹配 /apps/[appId] 格式
 49	 const appMatch = cleanPath.match(/^apps\/([^\/]+)/)
 50	 if (appMatch) {
 51	 const appId = appMatch[1] as AppId
 52	 return APP_REGISTRY[appId] ? appId : null
 53	 }
 54	 
 55	 return null
 56	}
 57	
 58	// 通过子域名查找应用ID
 59	export function findAppBySubdomain(subdomain: string): AppId | null {
 60	 // 这里可以实现子域名到应用ID的映射
 61	 // 目前简单映射：calculator.domain.com -> calculator
 62	 const mappings: Record<string, AppId> = {
 63	 calc: 'calculator',
 64	 calculator: 'calculator',
 65	 todo: 'todo',
 66	 weather: 'weather',
 67	 }
 68	 
 69	 return mappings[subdomain] || null
 70	}
 71	
 72	// 获取应用配置（不加载组件）
 73	export async function getAppConfig(appId: AppId): Promise<AppConfig | null> {
 74	 try {

 3	// 应用组件接口

 7	}
 8	
 9	// 应用注册表 - 延迟加载所有应用
 10	const APP_REGISTRY = {
 11	 calculator: () => import('@/apps/calculator/app'),
 12	 'code-converter': () => import('@/apps/code-converter/app'),
 13	 'markdown-editor': () => import('@/apps/markdown-editor/index'),
 14	 'qr-generator': () => import('@/apps/qr-generator/index'),
 15	 'rootcause-analyzer': () => import('@/apps/rootcause-analyzer/index'),
 16	 // 更多应用将在这里注册...
 17	} as const
 18	
 19	export type AppId = keyof typeof APP_REGISTRY
 20	
 21	// 获取所有注册的应用ID
 22	export function getRegisteredApps(): AppId[] {
 23	 return Object.keys(APP_REGISTRY) as AppId[]
 24	}
 25	
 26	// 动态加载应用
 27	export async function loadApp(appId: AppId): Promise<AppModule | null> {
 28	 try {
 29	 const loader = APP_REGISTRY[appId]
 30	 if (!loader) {
 31	 console.error(`应用 "${appId}" 未注册`)
 32	 return null
 33	 }
 34	 
 35	 const module = await loader()
 36	 return module
 37	 } catch (error) {
 38	 console.error(`加载应用 "${appId}" 失败:`, error)
 39	 return null
 40	 }
 41	}
 42	
 43	// 通过路径查找应用ID
 44	export function findAppByPath(path: string): AppId | null {
 45	 // 移除前导斜杠
 46	 const cleanPath = path.replace(/^\/+/, '')
 47	 
 48	 // 匹配 /apps/[appId] 格式
 49	 const appMatch = cleanPath.match(/^apps\/([^\/]+)/)
 50	 if (appMatch) {
 51	 const appId = appMatch[1] as AppId
 52	 return APP_REGISTRY[appId] ? appId : null
 53	 }
 54	 
 55	 return null
 56	}
 57	
 58	// 通过子域名查找应用ID
 59	export function findAppBySubdomain(subdomain: string): AppId | null {
 60	 // 这里可以实现子域名到应用ID的映射
 61	 // 目前简单映射：calculator.domain.com -> calculator
 62	 const mappings: Record<string, AppId> = {
 63	 calc: 'calculator',
 64	 calculator: 'calculator',
 65	 todo: 'todo',
 66	 weather: 'weather',
 67	 }
 68	 
 69	 return mappings[subdomain] || null
 70	}
 71	
 72	// 获取应用配置（不加载组件）
 73	export async function getAppConfig(appId: AppId): Promise<AppConfig | null> {
 74	 try {
 75	 const app = await loadApp(appId)
 76	 return app?.config || null
 77	 } catch (error) {
